Name: Pain Split
Effect: Single Target. Spend 1 Will Point to activate. Deal up to 3 Damage to the Target, Heal 1 HP to the User for every Damage dealt this way. This Move Fails if the User has more than Half HP rounded down. This Move cannot reduce a Target to less than 1 HP.
Description: The user shares its pain with the foe. After a short while it becomes excruciating for the target.
